entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Fast drivable areas estimation with multi-task learning for real-time autonomous driving assistant,” has been accepted for publication in Applied Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.679, Q2).
entry.summary: [2021. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Fast drivable areas estimation with multi-task learning for real-time autonomous driving assistant,” has been accepted for publication in Applied Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.679, Q2).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “A Mating Selection Based on Modified Strengthened Dominance Relation for NSGA-III,” has been accepted for publication in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.258, Top 7.2%).
entry.summary: [2021. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “A Mating Selection Based on Modified Strengthened Dominance Relation for NSGA-III,” has been accepted for publication in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.258, Top 7.2%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 09] Congratulations! Jae-Hyun’s paper, “Deep Learning based Multi-class Defect Learning for Steel Defect Detection and Segmentation,” has been accepted in KAIC 2021.
entry.summary: [2021. 09] Congratulations! Jae-Hyun’s paper, “Deep Learning based Multi-class Defect Learning for Steel Defect Detection and Segmentation,” has been accepted in KAIC 2021.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 08] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Spatio-temporal Weight of Active Region for Human Activity Recognition,” has been accepted in ACPR 2021.
entry.summary: [2021. 08] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Spatio-temporal Weight of Active Region for Human Activity Recognition,” has been accepted in ACPR 2021.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 07] Our Lab is selected as the 최초혁신실험실 (1년, 1억원) funded by the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF)!
entry.summary: [2021. 07] Our Lab is selected as the 최초혁신실험실 (1년, 1억원) funded by the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF)!

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 03] Our Lab is selected as the 우수신진연구 (4년, 6억원) funded by the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF)!

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2021. 02] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Visual Question Answering Based on Local-Scene-Aware Referring Expression Generation,” has been accepted for publication in Neural Networks (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.050, Top 8.9%).
entry.summary: [2021. 02] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Visual Question Answering Based on Local-Scene-Aware Referring Expression Generation,” has been accepted for publication in Neural Networks (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.050, Top 8.9%).
